name: LINES [demo]
description:
You play as Brimstone, a woman in a mask who is looking for her sister. Explore the First Neighborhood and face all obstacles with contempt. Use your fists. Find your sister, and everything will be okay.

______________________________________________________

This demo is a 15-20 minute experience.

 Please leave feedback whether positive or negative -- it will influence the final product.  

Donations are a way to express appreciation, but they are not required.
